examples: I like to read in bed before I go to sleep.
He spent the whole day in bed because he was sick.
Me gusta leer en la cama antes de dormir.
Pasó todo el día en la cama porque estaba enfermo.

suggested: A bed that feels like sleeping on a cloud.
The feeling of sinking into a soft and cozy bed after a long day.
A bed that promotes restful and uninterrupted sleep.
A king-sized bed with plush bedding and pillows.
A place where dreams are made and where the day's worries disappear.
The warmth and comfort of snuggling up in a cozy bed on a cold night.
A personal sanctuary and escape from the stresses of the outside world.
